name: Lover Sun
description: Your role is a lover. You must complete the love note with Lover Moon in order to win the game. You do not know who Lover Moon is.

name: Lover Moon
description: Your role is a lover. You must complete the love note with Lover Sun in order to win the game. You do not know who Lover Sun is.

name: Tattle Thunder
description: Your role is a tattle tale. You must tattle on at least one of the lovers in order to win the game. You only have one chance to tattle.

name: Nebula
description: Your role is a friend. You must help the lovers complete their notes before the tattle taler finds out who the lovers are. You do not know who the tattle or the lovers are.
